mapper.select: SELECT concat(t.TABLE_SCHEMA, '.', t.TABLE_NAME) table_schema, c.COLUMN_NAME column_name FROM information_schema.TABLES t inner join information_schema.COLUMNS c on t.TABLE_SCHEMA = c.TABLE_SCHEMA and t.TABLE_NAME = c.TABLE_NAME where t.TABLE_SCHEMA not in ('information_schema', 'mysql', 'sys', 'performance_schema')
